snippet: The state’s economic development agency sued Curt Schilling, a former Red Sox pitcher, and some of its former officials on Thursday, saying they misled the state.
abstract: Rhode Island’s economic development agency sues Curt Schilling, former Red Sox pitcher, and some former state officials, saying they had misled state into approving loan guarantee to Schilling’s failed video game company 38 Studios.
lead_paragraph: The state’s economic development agency sued Curt Schilling, a former Red Sox pitcher, and some of its former officials on Thursday, saying they misled the state.

headline.main: Ex-Red Sox Star Accused of Fraud in Rhode Island
headline.print_headline: Rhode Island: Ex-red Sox Star Accused of Fraud
